title: Special Physical Education I
requirements:
Not for PESH and ESHE Majors.
Not for IASP students.
description: This course is offered as one of the courses under the Required Physical Education Programme. It aims at developing and nurturing students with disabled conditions or special health problems the concepts of sports activities participation and choosing some sports activities for life long participation. Content includes: recognizing the foundation and principles of Physical Education, participating in light exercises and physical conditioning, nurturing positive attitudes and values toward sports participation, etc.
outcome: At the end of the course, students are able to1.          demonstrate the basic skills of some sports activities;2.          gain physical fitness through participation in various sports;3.          acquire general knowledge of sport activities;4.          demonstrate positive attitudes and values toward sports participation;5.          demonstrate an appreciation of sports as a spectator and a participant.完成體育特別班課程後，學生能夠1.          展示基本輕巧運動技術；2.          透過參與各類型運動改善體適能；3.          掌握基本運動常識；4.          展示對參與運動的正面態度及價值觀；5.          透過作為觀眾和參與者展示對運動的欣賞。

title: Physical Conditioning
requirements:
For male only.
Not for PESH and ESHE Majors.
Not for IASP students.
Not for students who have taken PHED1220.
description: This course is offered as one of the courses under the Required Physical Education Programme. It aims at developing students’ fundamental fitness concepts and an option as a lifelong physical activity. Contents of this course include basic concepts of physical fitness, exercise safety, basic techniques of using fitness room facilities, basic principles of exercise prescription, basic knowledge and techniques of fitness testing, basic knowledge to choose the appropriate exercise mode and design fitness programmes, nurturing positive attitudes and values toward lifelong physical activity participation etc.
outcome: At the end of the course, students are able to1. perform the basic techniques of using fitness room facilities and exercise safely;2. use the most appropriate method to improve the fitness level;3. describe the basic concepts of physical fitness;4. administer the fitness testing and interpret the results accordingly;5. design the plan of exercise prescription on different fitness components in accordance with the basic principles (including weight management);6. demonstrate positive attitudes and values toward lifelong participation in physical activities. 完成體能鍛鍊課程後，學生能夠1. 掌握運用健身室設備之基本技術並安全地運動；2. 運用最恰當的方法改善體能水平；3. 敍述體適能基本概念；4. 正確地進行各項體適能要素之測試，並懂得闡釋其測試結果；5. 按基本原則設計各體適能要素之運動處方計劃 (包括體重控制)；6. 展示參與終身體力活動的正面態度及價值觀。
